person.persName: James H. Scholl (Powell County, Kentucky, circuit court clerk and postmaster)

body.p: Powell County, Kentucky, circuit court clerk and postmaster. Kentucky native. Married to Talitha Scholl. Father of William Clayton Scholl, Mary M. Scholl, Malinda Ellen Scholl, Milared C. Scholl, and Betty A. Scholl. Farmer in Clark County, Kentucky, in 1850. Clerk of the Powell Circuit Court from 1858 to 1867. Postmaster of Stanton, Kentucky, from 1864 to 1865.
